projects.name: Museek
projects.description: Our final project at Technigo is a website that allows users to discover untypical museums across the world. We created the design, the frontend and the backend including authorization and authentication of logged in users. Please note that the database is loading slowly due to free deployment on Render.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app fetching weather data from OpenWeatherMap API. Key features include presenting weather data, functionalities such as displaying current weather, sunrise/sunset times, 5-day forecast and a search function for different cities.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: A React app to display album releases. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. The focus is on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Followed a given design in Figma and prioritised accessibility using Google Lighthouse.

projects.name: To Do App
projects.description: Create a todo app utilizing the Context API, allowing users to add, list, and remove tasks while ensuring a clean design. Includes component hierarchy and global state management.

projects.name: Movie Collection
projects.description: Movie library with data fetched from themoviedb.org's API. Features include display movie list, rendering movie specifics, and managing image URLs. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.

projects.name: Labyrinth Game
projects.description: A text-based adventure built using Zustand for state management and an API to post data. In this interactive game, players navigate through a series of choices based on the provided descriptions and actions. The project also includes creating a user-friendly design and handling loading states.

projects.name: UX Collaboration
projects.description: In this project I transformed a UX student's design into a landing page for a fitness club using React and Tailwind. This project bridges the gap between design and development, showcasing the art of bringing visuals to life with code.
